summary.para: Queries whether an app package is a non-qualified resource package.

param.name: isNonQualifiedResourcePackage
param.para: True if the package is a non-qualified resource package, False otherwise.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Represents an object model of the package manifest that provides methods to access manifest elements and attributes.
